movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns that the world he lives in is actually a computer simulation and fights to free humanity.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of a safe haven.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.description: Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Nazis can claim its mystical powers.

movies.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
movies.description: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma and sets out on a path of revenge against the assassins who tried to kill her and her unborn child.

movies.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
movies.description: A skilled swordsman is given the task of delivering a powerful sword to a worthy successor. Things get complicated when the sword is stolen.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: A retired hitman comes out of retirement to seek revenge on the gangsters who killed his dog.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both past and future.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.description: A Black man visits his white girlfriend's family for the weekend, where he discovers a sinister truth about their intentions.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.description: The Graham family grapples with the terrifying secrets of their ancestry after the death of their grandmother.

movies.title: [REC]
movies.description: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a quarantined apartment building and soon realize the situation is far worse than they anticipated.

movies.title: It Follows
movies.description: A young woman learns she is haunted by a mysterious entity that only she can see. In order to survive, she must pass this curse on to someone else.

movies.title: The Babadook
movies.description: A widowed single mother and her son deal with the arrival of a sinister entity after reading a mysterious children's book.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A hobbit named Frodo inherits the One Ring, and with the help of a fellowship embarks on a quest to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: A sullen young girl wanders into the spirit world and must work in a bathhouse for spirits to find her way back.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.description: In war-torn Spain, a young girl escapes into a fantastical world of faeries and monsters, where she believes she may find a way to save her ailing mother.

movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle
movies.description: A young woman cursed with an old age spell finds herself working for a powerful but kind wizard.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.description: On a journey to find a cure for a mysterious illness, a young warrior prince encounters forest gods, demons, and nature spirits in a battle between humanity and the natural world.

movies.title: The NeverEnding Story
movies.description: A shy boy discovers a magical book that takes him to the fantastical world of Fantasia, a land filled with wonder and creatures in need of a hero.

movies.title: Groundhog Day
movies.description: A weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again.

movies.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
movies.description: Zohan, an Israeli counterterrorist commando, stages his own death when he grows tired of his job and travels to New York City to pursue his lifelong dream of having a career in hairstyling.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.description: A mistaken identity throws a carefree bowler into the midst of a Los Angeles kidnapping scheme.

movies.title: Bridesmaids
movies.description: A woman's life gets complicated when she's entrusted with planning her best friend's wedding.

movies.title: 21 Jump Street
movies.description: Two undercover cops are forced to go back to high school to bust a drug ring.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A man is sentenced to life in Shawshank prison for the murder of his wife, but he never gives up hope of freedom.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of over a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The story of the Corleone family under patriarch Vito Corleone, focusing on the transformation of his youngest son, Michael, from reluctant family outsider to ruthless mafia boss.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: Andrew enrols in a music conservatory to become a drummer. But he is mentored by Terence Fletcher, whose unconventional training methods push him beyond the boundaries of reason and sensibility.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happiness
movies.description: A struggling single father and his son face homelessness as they pursue a better life.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.description: A rebellious young janitor with a gift for mathematics is sent to therapy to confront his past traumas.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.description: A journey through the history of mankind, aided by mysterious black monoliths, with themes of humanity's evolution, technology, and artificial intelligence.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.description: In a future Los Angeles, a blade runner (retired replicant hunter) is tasked with retiring a group of replicants who have escaped back to Earth.

movies.title: Alien
movies.description: The crew of a commercial space tug is awakened from their hypersleep to investigate a distress signal, leading them to a terrifying alien encounter.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist is recruited by the military to help them understand the language of aliens who have arrived on Earth.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A professional thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.description: A mentally unstable Vietnam veteran works as a night taxi driver in New York City, where the crime and grime consume him as he spirals into violence.
